H0.text: Cathay is a poetic name for which country. Mongolia

H1.text: Cathay is a poetic name for which country. Japan

H2.text: Cathay is a poetic name for which country. Korea

H3.text: Cathay is a poetic name for which country. 中国

A4.text: The term Cathay became a poetic name for China.

A5.text: The name Cathay was used in Marco Polo's book on his travels in Yuan dynasty China (he referred to southern China as Mangi).
